div.p: Response coefficients of the four Stipa species to precipitation variability under different temperature treatments. (a) S. breviflora, (b) S. bungeana, (c) S. grandis, (d) S. baicalensis. T0, T1, and T2 denote increasing temperature by 0, 1.5, and 2.0°C, respectively, relative to the average temperature of the growing season over past 30 years in the four Spita plants
